mapper.insert: insert into category_brand (id, brand_id, category_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{id}, #{brandId}, #{categoryId}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.update:
update category_brand set
brand_id = #{brandId},
category_id = #{categoryId},
update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select b.* from category_brand cb left join brand b on b.id = cb.brand_id where cb.category_id = #{categoryId} and cb.is_deleted = 0 order by cb.id desc
